column4: Hi, just installed Ubuntu 9.10 64 bit.. I do not see a /boot/grub/menu.lst file.. Also, when booting and i hit ESC it will not drop me into the grub menu. Any ideas?
grub 2.x   in 9.1  even 1.x doesn't use menu.lst anymore, your 'labels' and bootable partiions are at /boot/grub/grub.cfg
and the command 'update-grub'   will 'recreate it' after probing all partitions
